0P00000YVL.L.long_name: Barings International Umbrella Fund - Barings Asia Growth Fund ClassA GBP Inc
0P00000YVL.L.summary: The investment objective of the Fund is to achieve long-term capital growth in the value of assets by investing in Asia and the Pacific region excluding Japan. The Fund will seek to achieve its investment objective by investing at least 70% of its total assets in equities and equityrelated securities of companies incorporated in, or exercising the predominant part of their economic activity in the Asia Pacific region excluding Japan, or quoted or traded on the stock exchanges in those countries, including developed and emerging markets

0P00002AXW.F.summary: The investment seeks to maximise the performance of listed Asian equities (Japan non-included). The fund invests at least 60% of assets in south-east Asian equities. It may invest up to 40% of assets in private and public bonds with a minimum rating of BBB(S&P) and a duration smaller than 10 years ; but also negotiable debt securities and money market instruments with a minimum rating of A3 (S&P) and a duration smaller than 3 months.

0P00008WDU.TW.summary: The fund invests in stocks listed on the Stock Exchange and OTC Exchange of Taiwan, depositary receipts, beneficiary certificates, and Taiwanese fixed income securities including government bonds, corporate bonds, convertible bonds, asset-backed securities, REITs as well as bonds issued by international financial institutions.
0P00008WDU.TW.family: KGI Securities Investment Trust Co., Ltd

0P0000JA9T.L.long_name: Hamon Asian Market Leaders Fund GBP
0P0000JA9T.L.summary: The investment objective of the Sub-Fund is long-term capital appreciation which it seeks to achieve by investing at least two thirds of its total assets in listed equity securities of companies domiciled in, or exercising the predominant part of their economic activities in, Asia. The generation of dividend and interest income is not the prime consideration of the Investment Advisor.

0P00017XPC.HK.summary: The fund aims to provide capital appreciation to unitholders by investing primarily in a portfolio of relatively higher yielding debt and equity securities in Asian region.
